s: March 10, 2025 - When Amazon Prime Video began to produce original content in 2013, all of the animated content were produced by third-party companies. However, in January 2019, it was announced that Amazon Prime Video was developing original animated projects in-house including Earthworm Jim and Magic Tree House.
